testsuite.name: tests.TestSuite.Login001
testsuite.system-out: TC Name : Verify login successful when enter a valid loginID and password values Step 1: Navigate to homepage and go to the Login function Step 2: Login on the website Step 2.1: Click on Login Link: Step 2.2: Enter a valid username Step 2.3: Enter a valid password Step 2.4: Click on [Sign in] button Step 3: Click on People Setting icon Step 4.1: Click on Add People menu Step 4.2: Add the 1st user into list Step 4.3: Add the 2nd user into list Step 4.4: Add the 3rd user into list Step 4.5: Click on Add People button Step 5: Verify Congratulation display
